reviewText:
I watched this with my little sister, and neither of us were impressed. It didn't tell us much of anything, acting like it was really cool. It seemed like it was made for kids (ones, my sister points out, who know some long words), and the quality almost indicated it was made BY kids. The commentator is a young girl who's not much of an actress, and sounds too excited for things not that exciting.
Eyewitness videos are much more entertaining and informative.
